.lnb_nav>li{margin-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a{position:relative;display:block;color:#000;font-size:18px;font-weight:700;padding:15px;letter-spacing:1px}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a:before{left:50%}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a:after{right:50%}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a:after,.lnb .lnb_nav>li:hover>a:before{width:40px}.lnb .lnb_nav>li:nth-child(2):hover>a:after,.lnb .lnb_nav>li:nth-child(2):hover>a:before,.lnb .lnb_nav>li:nth-child(3):hover>a:after,.lnb .category_menu ul li a{transition:color .2s}.header .category_menu ul li a:hover{color:#00f}.header .category_menu>div{width:20%;padding-left:30px;border-right:1px solid #ccc}.header .category_menu>div:last-child{border:none}.header .kids_down .category_menu{justify-content:center}.header .kids_down .category_menu div{flex-basis:290px}.header .brand_down .brand_menu{display:flex}.header .brand_down .brand_menu li{margin-left:20px}.header .brand_down .brand_menu li:first-child{margin-left:0}.header .brand_down .brand_menu li a{display:block}.header .brand_down .brand_menu li a .brand_img{overflow:hidden}.header .brand_down .brand_menu img{width:100%;height:370px;transition:transform .4s}.header .brand_down .brand_menu li a .brand_img:hover .search_down .input_box input{width:calc(100% - 60px);height:60px;outline:none;border:none;font-size:24px;font-weight:700;text-align:center;color:#000;background:none}.header .search_down .input_box input::placeholder{text-align:center}.header .search_down .search_blur{position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;height:100vh;z-index:-1;backdrop-filter:blur(20px)}.login_section{width:100%;margin:0 auto;padding-top:130px}.login_wrap{width:600px;margin:0 input:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.eye,.eye_off{position:absolute;bottom:20px;right:25px;cursor:pointer;color:#ccc}.eye_off{display:none}.id_box{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin-top:5px}#id_save,.login_wrap .social_kakao{background:url(/efca7f2d9ef3c714f72471560891ecf5.png) no-repeat center left 20px}.logbtn{margin:30px 0}.logbtn a{display:block;background-color:#002053;color:#fff;padding:15px
